2741b69c3b371bf320f870bfe5de76c7 (09:38): +and that our implementation necessitates that is the actual bug
0a85eb3a1c6d6fe7b9cd8cc3a0c93718 (09:38): +it's funny, at recon...the intel guy used msvc on AMD
0a85eb3a1c6d6fe7b9cd8cc3a0c93718 (09:38): +the ms guys were using google and ollydbg/softice..
0a85eb3a1c6d6fe7b9cd8cc3a0c93718 (09:38): +the symantec girl was dissing her company to hell
0a85eb3a1c6d6fe7b9cd8cc3a0c93718 (09:39): +i guess that explains why most of the people in this industry had 6 jobs in 5 years

a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (10:29): +I have recently developed a hate for miss matched ram sticks. Ok the same speed but don't work dual channel at full speed without random errors.  And I do mean random.
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (10:30): +Yet swap either one of the sticks with a spare I have problem disappears.  Really annoying.
2741b69c3b371bf320f870bfe5de76c7 (10:30): +i had a 16meg simm for my sparc years ago that always gave me problems within the first day of booting
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (10:32): +Corsair all of them. Same type.  Yet 1 out of 3 combinations does not work.
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (10:32): +Yes guess what One I put in the system first.  Error some where between 5 mins to  2 hours.
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (10:34): +Wonder if a windows user would have notices as quickly.
2741b69c3b371bf320f870bfe5de76c7 (10:36): +because windows is based on so many components and coding standards, it's easy for a windows box to mimic hardware failure because of cruft

2741b69c3b371bf320f870bfe5de76c7 (10:37): +it's sad when somebody who isn't computer savvy pops their old computer in the garbage because of spyware, a failed install of msoffice or some other correctible software problem
2741b69c3b371bf320f870bfe5de76c7 (10:37): +that makes the computer do the windows equivalent of showing the sad mac
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (10:38): +At least you could laugh at the sad mac
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (10:38): +What is funny about a normal BSOD
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (10:54): +It the one thing I want from reactos.  Is a predictable version of windows.  Ok siting on windows drivers might be asking a little to much.
